loclizedContent.En: Hedgehog was abducted by aliens! It's not his fault!
loclizedContent.Cn: 刺刺头被外星人绑架了!不是他的错!

loclizedContent.En: He's close to the Doge Gang.
He just wants to be alone. Friends are not everything in life. Can you understand his feelings?
loclizedContent.Cn: 也许……他只是想一个人待会儿……朋友不是人生的全部,你能体谅这种心情吧?

loclizedContent.En: Romeo met his Juliet. John fell in love with Jane.
